column1: images/IMG_20191023_174947,Clip the small nose off the butterfly-pin nail
column2: Push the nail at the front-side (with logo) trough the hole on the top of the board
column3: Solder the nail on the back-side
column4: Caution: The nail stays hot a long time!,

column1: images/IMG_20191023_174947,Hinweis: LEDs do have a direction! The direction is shown by the length of the legs. The board has a printed circle with a dent at one side (right)
column2: Push the LED with the short leg at the side of the dent trough the holes in the board,

column1: images/IMG_20191023_174537,Bend the legs until the LED stays by it self in the holes
column2: Solder the legs at the back-side of the board
column4: Clip the rest of the legs,

column1: images/IMG_20191023_175342,Push the battery holder as shown at the back-side of the board into the holes
column2: Solder the pins at the front-side,

column1: images/IMG_20191023_175534,Push the battery with the plus-symbol showing into the battery holder
